Name: Pineapple Lassi Cocktail
Ingredients: 3 wedge Pineapple (fresh) cored, skinned and chopped
Instructions: MUDDLE cardamom and then pineapple in base of shaker. ADD other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Creamy yoghurty cardamom and pineapple laced with vodka.
History: Created in 2011 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England.
